website_summaries.verdict: A full-featured grill and smoker that is solidly constructed and easy to keep clean.
pros: Well-constructed option that offers electronic start ignition, internal food temperature monitor, and a large interior
cons: Comes with a bit of a learning curve to find the precise temperatures that are suitable for preparing various types of foods

customer_reviews.title: Ok grill Update great grill
customer_reviews.text: Nice item my second pellet grill wanted a smaller one. But they advertise 500 degrees but it will not do 500 I even bought insulated cover then instructed not to use over 350 degrees so what good is this cover other wise glad I bought it and not the competition one so many more features the side gas burner is really nice we’ll build Up date I’m so glad I purchased camp chef the co is fantastic! They worked with me in replacement parts to get this grill to 500 degrees as that’s why I bought it to do pizzas on it I’m so glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: D. GOEDEL

customer_reviews.title: Pellet Grills Rule!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease of use! Just fill the hopper, connect it, set the temp, let it reach reach set temp, and put your meat in the grill. The temp probe allows you to monitor cooking level. The biggest adjustment will be changing how you cook vs propane or charcoal. I personally think wood pellet cooking is superior. You have more control and great smoked flavor!!
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Here is the answer to smoky flavor with less effort
customer_reviews.text: This is the best answer to outdoor cooking that will give you great results nice smoky flavors and a minimum of effort. The wood pellets provide the smoke and heat the water provides pellet feed, automatically to maintain the temperature you select so all you have to worry about is refilling the pellet hopped every so often. I was able to cook a 14 lb Turkey in 3 hrs and it tasted great! I swore by Weber and that is all I had for years but this one is great for slow cooking as well as grilling at high temps also. Highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Army Aviation1

customer_reviews.title: Nice pellet grill
customer_reviews.text: This grill replaced a Zgrill. It cooks better and more evenly with the fire box in the middle. It is less expensive than the Traeger and does a better job, IMO. The included meat temp probe is a nice bonus. The only criticism is the lack of a shelf. Yes, they do sell them but they are very expensive. Should be included.
customer_reviews.author: garyneth

customer_reviews.title: A great pellet grill
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble it took about an hour. I had a electric smoker it's like night and day. The camp chef is a great grill. It is so easy to use. It holds the temperature real good. I've used the grill 10 times and haven't had any issues. The ash clean out is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jtwolf

customer_reviews.title: Camp Chef Grill is great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting one of these all year! Assembly was easy and I have already used it twice(even in winter!). The smoker is excellent(ribs and roast were great)....
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Ray Clardy Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Not sold on pellet grill
customer_reviews.text: My camp chef works good at 250 and above but any temperature setting 225 and below then you never know what you might get. All over the map. Gets way to hot and even goes off from time to time. I finally took my roast out of the grill and put it in my oven.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting food !
customer_reviews.text: Made some fantastic ribs and hamburgers so far. Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and easy to attend
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed and constructed. Makes smoke, but the smoke isn't constant. Rather a nice change, imo. Only thing that lacked was the ability to easily change the pellets to a different 'flavor' or just empty the hopper. Other than that, it's a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: BowSlayer

customer_reviews.title: Just sorry, I didn't get one sooner!
customer_reviews.text: This is so nice to use, I use it almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A.

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: This grill was easy to assemble and easy to use. The meat never burns because there's no direct flame. The smoke flavors the meat perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn A. Martinie

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Awesome smoker/grill!!! I have used it 3 times and everything has tasted amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Irvine

customer_reviews.title: Love this, very easy to use with great results highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and easy to use holds temperature really well. I wish I would have purchased it with the sear box.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy K.

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker!
customer_reviews.text: I love this smoker. I have had 3 smokers and it’s the best by far. It’s easy to use, easy to set up and cooks well. I would give it 5 stars, but the temperature varies too much for me. When I set it to 225 it fluctuates between 205 and 255.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Bellson

product_meta.title: Camp Chef SmokePro XT Wood Pellet Grill Smoker, Bronze (PG24XTB)
product_meta.description: Change the way you cook outdoors and bring the savory simplicity of the SmokePro XT Pellet Grill to your back patio. Just like your kitchen oven, the SmokePro XT automatically maintains whatever temperature you set, so you don't have to worry about over or under-cooking your meal. The SmokePro XT pellet grill comes standard with Smart Smoke Technology to evenly distribute wood-fired flavor into every bite. Skip the tedious cleaning routine associated with traditional pellet grills thanks to the Simple Ash-Cleanout System. Simply dump the ash after every cook and save yourself hours of cleaning while enjoying better flavor on your next masterpiece as a result. The SmokePro XT can tackle anything from fatty pork butts to quick and easy burgers. Shop the Camp Chef SmokePro XT today and see for yourself why Camp Chef is the way to cook outdoors.
feature_bullets: PREMIUM TEMPERATURE RANGE From 160ºF Up to 500ºF for Slow Smoking or Quick Grilling (25,000 BTU)
PATENTED ASH CLEAN-OUT CUP SYSTEM No More Hours-of-Vacuuming Business
SMART SMOKE TECHNOLOGY For Minimal Temperature Swings
DIGITAL CONTROLLER For LED Chamber and Internal Food Temp Readings
FLEXIBLE COMPATIBILITY Trick Out Your XT With A Number of Available Camp Chef Accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars28 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
